prompt:
This is an image of an **unpaved road surface**. The edges of the image may contain black areas that are not part of the road surface. Please ignore these areas when assessing the condition and focus only on the road surface area visible in the image. Describe the surface condition of this image in the following aspects:
Surface Condition
Color Uniformity
Defects.
text: The surface condition of the road in the image is uneven, with a mix of light and dark areas. The color uniformity is not consistent, as there are both light and dark areas on the road. There are no visible defects or cracks in the road surface.
